content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Federal asset forfeiture support. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Baton Rouge area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: James J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Sarah J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Susan T.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

content.about: Hannon Jewelers provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Federal asset forfeiture support. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Baton Rouge area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Patricia M.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.

reviews.author: Karen S.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Jessica R.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Hannon Jewelers's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

content.about: Baton Rouge Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Baton Rouge area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy J.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Linda B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Linda M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.
